scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:major: npm version major --git-tag-version -m "Update version to \"%s\"" && npm publish && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version -m "Update version to \"%s\"" && npm publish && npm run push
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version -m "Update version to \"%s\"" && npm publish && npm run push
scripts.version:premajor: npm version remajor && npm run commitVersionUpdate
scripts.version:preminor: npm version preminor && npm run commitVersionUpdate
scripts.version:prepatch: npm version prepatch && npm run commitVersionUpdate
scripts.commitVersionUpdate: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Update version to \"%npm_package_version%\""
